about_the_game:
Ayu, an ordinary little boy, is about to celebrate his 7th birthday. On the night before his birthday, Ayu is excitedly looking forward to the "amusement park trip" the next day. However, just as he is about to go to sleep, a terrifying stranger breaks into his home and kills his mother. A mysterious voice outside the window guides him to escape... At this moment, he realizes that the world has become strange and horrifying.

The little boy's nightmare has only just begun.

Use every tool at your disposal to survive in this nightmarish world.

Thank you for playing the demo version of this game. If you encounter any bugs or have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to join our official Discord.

About the Demo

Ayu, an ordinary little boy, is about to celebrate his 7th birthday. On the night before his birthday, Ayu is excitedly looking forward to the "amusement park trip" the next day. However, just as he is about to go to sleep, a terrifying stranger breaks into his home and kills his mother. A mysterious voice outside the window guides him to escape... At this moment, he realizes that the world has become strange and horrifying.

The little boy's nightmare has only just begun.

Use every tool at your disposal to survive in this nightmarish world.

Thank you for playing the demo version of this game. If you encounter any bugs or have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to join our official Discord.

pc_requirements.minimum:

pc_requirements.recommended:

short_description: A 3D side-scrolling adventure game where you delve into a bizarre and eerie dark world, unraveling the secrets hidden within. Utilize the items you acquire to battle against various sanity-draining monsters and bosses, tackle highly creative puzzles, and explore truths to uncover your fate...
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
